import_descriptive.title: Import services
import_descriptive.description:
Importer.1 supports the following structure:
id, ref, name, description, type, price, quantity,unit, extra_quantity_price, constraints_values, constraints_names, currency, duration
Indications:
  • Missing field values must be replaced with NULL : 2,green,NULL,A and not 2,green,,A
  • Decimal numbers must use "," as separator : 12,34
  • Values are always numbers(even constraint vales)
  • "False" and "true" must be replaced with 0 and 1
